Material Testing

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Something

Elcometer Ultrasonic Thickness Gauges

measures thickness of materials like metals, platics, glass, etc. using compatible transducer through the following modes:

  • Pulse Echo (PE) - standard method of measuring material
  • Interface Echo (IE) - displays the total thickness from the top
  • Echo to Echo (EE) - ignores the thickness of coated materials
  • PLAS Mode - mode specifically designed for very thin plastics

Go to official Elcometer page

Something

Elcometer Ultrasonic Transducer Options

A wide range of transducers for use with the Ultrasonic Thickness Gage which will meet the application considering the material to be tested, the measurement range and surface temperature of the material Microdot Transducer are designed to be repaired Potted Transducers are hard wired to the head.

Go to official Elcometer page

Something

Elcometer NDT Gauges

  • Flaw Detectors
  • Velocity Gauges
  • Corrosion Gauges
  • Precision Gauges
  • Sonic Gauges
  • Bolt Tension Gauges

Go to official Elcometer page
